Description: Paladins are knights in shiny armor who fight for their god.
Weapons: You are Trained in 2 Weapon Categories of choice (e.g. 1-Handed Melee, 2-Handed Ranged, Shields, etc).

~Proficiency in Religion~.Effect: Add your Level to Checks for knowing about religions, praying, performing sermons, faith, etc.

~Proficiency in Anything~.Effect:
Think of something specific your character is good at outside of combat (e.g. things like acrobatics, knowing about monsters, lying, etc).
Whenever you make a Check for what you're good at, add your Level to that Check.
~Proficiency in Anything~.Notes: For a full list of proficiencies, see the Proficiencies page.

Spellcasting.Change: You can change your known Spells (not Talents) when taking a Long Rest.
Spellcasting.Other: All Paladin-specific Abilities are considered Spells (unless stated otherwise).

Mana.Regain: You regain all Mana back when you Long Rest.

~Divine Sense~.Effect:
You sense if there are Undead, Demons, Fiends or Celestials, or holy or unholy places or objects within 15 meters.
Thick walls obstruct your Divine Sense.

~Lay on Hands~.Effect:
You have (3 + Main Stat + Your Level) Holy points.
Using an action, you can expend any amount of Holy Points to heal a creature for that amount.
All your Holy Points replenish on Long Rests.

~Divine Smite~.Effect: Add 2d6 True damage to a melee attack (after you roll).

Starting Abilities Description.Divine Sense: You have the power to detect foul creatures within range. Use this carefully, as it has a long cooldown.

Starting Abilities Description.Lay on Hands and Divine Smite:
If your Main Stat is 2, then at Level 1 you have 3 + 2 + 1 Holy Points; that means 6 Holy Points.
At Level 2, you have 8 Holy points. At Level 3, you have 9 Holy points. And so on.
You might receive other Abilities in the future that consume or replenish Holy Points.
Divine Smite will bring wrath upon your foes!

Specializations.Description:
At Level 1, you can choose your oath (Specialization).
By choosing your oath, you dedicate yourself to a purpose; an oath is a lifestyle, not a mere choice!
Choices: Oath of Conquest, which inspires a strong personality and desire to achieve greatness by any means necessary
Oath of Devotion, dedicated to helping the unfortunate and being someone to look up to
Oath of Protection, chosen by those who vow to protect and wish to become a paragon of the people

~Oath of Conquest~.Effect:
Every Worthy Enemy YOU defeat grants you 1d4 Holy Points.
You also gain Proficiency in Indimidation if you don't have it already.

~Impose~.Effect: A Unit must pass a Wisdom Check or be Feared. It has -2 to the roll if it's a Humanoid or Unholy.

<Pledge of Conquest>.Effect:
Ask a party member to join your cause and pledge his/her honor to you.
That person can use Divine Smite once per Long Rest.
It can also cast Lay on Hands using your Holy Points and always Knows the same Generic Divine Spells you Know at a time.
Additionally, Oath of Conquest also happens when that ally defeats a Worthy Enemy.
<Pledge of Conquest>.Notes:
You can only have one character who pledged for you.
The number of Holy Points of the ally does not increase.
If you ever change this Talent, the ally loses access to all things mentioned; it regains them when you get this Talent again.

<Retribution>.Effect:
You lose Lay on Hands, but gain access to the Eldritch Spell List. For you, if an Eldritch Spell costs 1 Mana, it instead has a Long Rest Cooldown (regardless of its normal Cooldown).
You can't cast Spells that cost more than 1 Mana.

<Fury Smite>.Effect: After an attack, deal 50% of the weapon damage done by the attack (dice plus any modifiers) to all enemies within 3 meters around the target (except you).
<Fury Smite>.Notes:
The damage of the attack counts as the dice rolled + any modifiers.
Using Divine Smite over an attack, for example, does not count as added to the weapon damage.
Damage done means damage inflicted after Defense and Resistances calculations.
Cover is applied normally for the AoE.

<Divine Reach>.Effect:
You empower yourself to make your melee weapons send fiery waves.
Your melee attacks have up to 3 meters range, deal 1d4 extra Damage and deal Fire Damage instead of Physical.
Lasts 1 minute.
Also, passively, you can now cast smites on ranged attacks (normally, you can only cast Smite on melee attacks).
<Divine Reach>.Notes:
Attacks like this count as either melee or ranged attacks, your choice. Targets still benefit from Cover, regardless.
Alternatively, if it makes sense for your character, the DM might allow it to deal Cold, Necrotic or Shock damage instead of Fire. Talk to your DM about this.

<Vengeance>.Effect:
When a Worthy Enemy dies in combat, get a Vengeance Counter.
Immediately when you get to 6 Vengeance Counters, gain 1 Mana or gain 4 Holy Points or reset the Cooldown of a Generic Spell you know (you choose).
You keep your Vengeance Counters even on Long Rests.

<Victory Smite>.Effect: After half (rounded down) of Worthy Enemies in a combat have been defeated, reset the Cooldown of Divine Smite or gain 7 Holy Points (you choose).

<Lay on Arms>.Effect: Use when you would take damage. Negate all the damage. After this, you can immediately freely use Lay on Hands without using Actions.

~Oath of Devotion~.Effect:
You are immune to diseases and curses.
When using Lay on Hands, instead of healing, you can expend 3 points to cure a minor disease or a poison.
You have 5 more maximum Holy Points.

~Divine Power~.Notes: You can't keep more than your maximum number of Holy Points through a Long Rest.

<Divine Blast>.Effect:
Make a Spell attack against a target and consume any number of Holy points. The attack deals 1d4 True Damage for each Holy Point used.
You can apply Smites to this attack.

<Shielding Hand>.Effect: Use after an ally (or yourself) takes damage. After that ally (or yourself) takes damage, it gains Shielding equal to the damage taken (after Defense and Resistances). The shield lasts up to 1 minute.

<Focused Smites>.Effect:
For 1 minute, your weapon attacks and offensive spells deal extra True damage and heal an ally within 6 meters of the target (or yourself).
Bonus Damage and Heal: 1 for 1-Handed weapons and Half-Action Spells, 2 for 2-Handed weapons and 1 Action Spells.
<Focused Smites>.Notes: If a spell doesn't deal damage, just instantly deal the Focused Smites damage to the target.

<Divine Reach>.Effect:
You empower yourself to make your melee weapons send fiery waves.
Your melee attacks have up to 3 meters range, deal 1d4 extra Damage and deal Fire Damage instead of Physical.
Lasts 1 minute.
Also, passively, you can now cast smites on ranged attacks (normally, you can only cast Smite on melee attacks).
<Divine Reach>.Notes:
Attacks like this count as either melee or ranged attacks, your choice. Targets still benefit from Cover, regardless.
Alternatively, if it makes sense for your character, the DM might allow it to deal Cold, Necrotic or Shock damage instead of Fire. Talk to your DM about this.

<Life Echo>.Effect:
You put a Life Echo on another ally.
Whenever YOU heal a different Unit, the unit with the Life Echo on them is also healed for 50% of that amount.
Lasts 1 minute.

<Devotion Aura>.Effect: All allies on your team have +1 Defense if their Defense is lower than 3.
<Devotion Aura>.Notes: Does not stack with itself multiple times (from multiple Paladins).

<Broken Hearts>.Requirement: Only usable if all your Generic Abilities that have a Cooldown are on Cooldown
<Broken Hearts>.Effect:
All Humanoids within 4 meters of you must pass a Wisdom Check or take 3d4 True Damage and be Stunned.
They take half of that damage if they pass.

<Improved Faith Casting>.Effect:
Your Generic Faith Spells are amplified:
Invigorate now heals for an extra 1d4.
Searing Smite deals an extra 1d4 damage (both on hit and delayed).
Vindication always heals for an additional of 1d4.

Protection.Description: Lorem. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

~Oath of Protection~.Effect:
When another ally is attacked (after the roll), dash next to that ally.
The attack is now targeted on you instead of the ally.

~Stand Behind~.Effect:
You stand out for allies adjacent to you.
Enemy ranged attacks against other allies next to you have Cover.
~Stand Behind~.Notes: Nothing happens if an ally adjacent to you already has Cover. Next to you means 1 meter away (a square immediately next to you; works diagonally).

<Divine Rain>.Effect:
You prepare to take lethal blow.
If you would drop to 0 Health until the start of your next turn, you remain instead at 1 Health and can't take damage until the start of your next turn.
When this happens, divine rays strike all enemies within 3 meters of you, and they all take 1d6 True damage.

<Reckoning>.Effect:
Make a spell attack on a target for 2d10 Force damage.
It must pass a Might Check or be Crippled and pushed away from you until the distance between you and the target is 6 meters.
If it stops in a wall or another enemy, it takes another 1d10 Force damage.

<Consacrated Zone>.Effect:
The area in a 5 meter diameter circle around you becomes Consacrated.
While inside the area, your and all allies' Divine, Mysticism, Nature and Class Spells (not Abilities) have their dice tier increased by 1.
Does not apply to Passive Spells.
<Consacrated Zone>.Notes:
Increasing dice by 1 tier means, for example, d6 become d8, or d10 become d12.
D12's and d20's don't increase.
Class Spells are Spells given by the character's class.

<Sanctuary Zone>.Effect:
Declare a 7x7 area.
All units in the area take only 50% damage (after Defense).
Lasts until the start of your next turn's next turn.

<Oath of Revenge>.Effect:
After you use Oath of Protection, you can immediately make an attack (freely) with a 1-Handed Melee Weapon on the attacker.
This attack has 3 meters range and deals True damage.
You can apply Smites to it.

<Improved Faith Casting>.Effect:
Your Generic Faith Spells are amplified:
Invigorate now heals for an extra 1d4.
Searing Smite deals an extra 1d4 damage (both on hit and delayed).
Vindication always heals for an additional of 1d4.
